class: middle


```{yaml echo = TRUE}
---
title: "Title of the report"
subtitle: "Subtitle of the report"
author: "Author Name"
date: "Date"
output: 
  pagedreport::paged_windmill:
    logo: "https://mk0rfortheresto0o08q.kinstacdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/rru-logo-blue.svg"
    img_to_dark: FALSE
    logo_to_white: TRUE
knit: pagedown::chrome_print
main-color: "#6cabdd"
---
```
